author: Opentrons
description:
This protocol distributes PCR mastermix from a source 96 deep well plate to a target Applied Biosystems Microamp optical 384 well 30 µL plate. The user can choose how many wells to transfer to (rounding up to the nearest number of columns) as well as how much volume to add to each well. The user can also choose whether they want to reuse tips, or pick up new tips for each transfer
Explanation of parameters below:
 Number of wells: How many wells to transfer mastermix to on the target plate. This will be rounded up to the nearest number of full columns.
 Volume of mastermix: Volume of mastermix to add to each well (µL)
* Reuse tips?: Yes: Reuse tips when distributing the mastermix. No: Drop the tips after each distribution, and pick up new tips before each aspiration.
labware:
Some 96 Deep well plate
MicroAmp Optical 384-Well Reaction Plate

markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.description:
This protocol distributes PCR mastermix from a source 96 deep well plate to a target Applied Biosystems Microamp optical 384 well 30 µL plate. The user can choose how many wells to transfer to (rounding up to the nearest number of columns) as well as how much volume to add to each well. The user can also choose whether they want to reuse tips, or pick up new tips for each transfer

Explanation of parameters below:
* `Number of wells`: How many wells to transfer mastermix to on the target plate. This will be rounded up to the nearest number of full columns.
* `Volume of mastermix`: Volume of mastermix to add to each well (µL)
* `Reuse tips?`: Yes: Reuse tips when distributing the mastermix. No: Drop the tips after each distribution, and pick up new tips before each aspiration.

---
markdown.labware:
* [Some 96 Deep well plate]()
* [MicroAmp Optical 384-Well Reaction Plate]()
markdown.notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the [Troubleshooting Survey](https://protocol-troubleshooting.paperform.co/).
markdown.process:
1. Input your protocol parameters above.
2. Download your protocol and unzip if needed.
3. Upload your custom labware to the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app) by navigating to `More` > `Custom Labware` > `Add Labware`, and selecting your labware files (.json extensions) if needed.
4. Upload your protocol file (.py extension) to the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app) in the `Protocol` tab.
5. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
6. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support articles](https://support.opentrons.com/en/collections/1559720-guide-for-getting-started-with-the-ot-2).
7. Hit 'Run'.
markdown.protocol-steps:
1. Pick up tips with the 20 µL multi-channel pipette
2. Aspirate the chosen volume of mastermix from the source plate
3. Distribute mastermix to the target plate
4. Drop the tips
4. Repeat steps 1 to 4 until the mastermix has been distributed to all wells
markdown.reagents:
* PCR mastermix in the first column of the source plate (well A1 to H1)

---
markdown.title: Distribution of PCR mastermix to MicroAmp 384 optical well plate

notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the Troubleshooting Survey.
pipettes:
20 µL multi-channel pipette
20 µL filter tips

Upload your protocol file (.py extension) to the OT App in the Protocol tab.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support articles.
Hit 'Run'.
protocol-steps:
Pick up tips with the 20 µL multi-channel pipette
Aspirate the chosen volume of mastermix from the source plate
Distribute mastermix to the target plate
Drop the tips
Repeat steps 1 to 4 until the mastermix has been distributed to all wells
reagents: PCR mastermix in the first column of the source plate (well A1 to H1)
title: Distribution of PCR mastermix to MicroAmp 384 optical well plate
